The meetup is a mix of technical discussion and hacking with higher level conversations about the direction of the project, what features it should implement, and how it can otherwise evolve over time.

topics.name: Live the Life of Your Dreams
Follow your Dreams and your Passions

results.description:
This is a New York City Live Your Legend Local group.

It is ideally for people who want to discover their life purpose and passions, or know it already but need to take steps to go about achieving it.

You should join if you want to have a supportive group that keeps you accountable in reaching that dream, because many people lack support from the people around them.

We'll hold the following type of events

• Financial education: How to use the money and the resources you already have

• Personal development: Skill and training that would help you move forward

• Social networking: Meet people who might help you break into your dream industry

• Unleash your creativity: Tap into your creative side

• Guest speaker: Stories from people who did it

• Contemplation and meditation: Discover yourself

These meet-ups will facilitate the development of relationships by gathering like minded people who want to make their goals a reality. You are a product of the people you hang out with, so the easiest way to change your future is to change your environment and the people you hang out with!
results.name: New York Dreams Come True

results.description: Social and support group for people with Chronic Fatigue Syndrome, Fibromyalgia, Lyme and other chronic illnesses.
results.name: Long Island Chronic Fatigue & Fibromyalgia Support Group

results.description:
If you...
are somewhere between age 40 to 60
are a MoMA member, or
are thinking about becoming one
get off work in the early afternoon or do not work a 9 to 5 office job
...this group is for you, because...

Most of our events will be at MoMA.
Some will be scheduled for MoMA members only.
Many will be scheduled in mid-afternoon.


If you are NOT a MoMA member and have no membership of any kind that grants you discounted or free access to MoMA you are still MORE THAN WELCOME to join this group. 
We ask , however, that you be prepared to pay for full admission tickets to MoMA and DO NOT post comments on our event pages asking OUR MoMA members to please offer you a guest ticket on their membership.  


Please know that in an effort to contain the widespread meetup issue of people non showing up at the event for which they RSVP, if you RSVP and DO NOT show up for two of our events you will be removed from the group.

In an equally important effort to contain another widespread meetup issue: that of people showing up at events late as if it were OK, we DO NOT wait for late people at our events.


We look forward to meeting you soon!!!
results.name: Mostly MoMA

results.description: This group is for moms that are looking for unique and useful solutions to their everyday problems. Share the services that are making your lives easier and discover new ones.
results.name: Helping make moms' lives easier

results.name: Westchester County-Great Dane Dog Hike and Play

results.description:
This is a brand NEW Toastmasters club that is forming in Edison, NJ named "What Exit Toastmasters" This club is geared towards anyone looking to improve their speaking and leadership skills while having fun and making new friends. We will hold one regular monthly meeting at 3 pm on 4th Saturday afternoon of each month with potential additional monthly meetings or events to follow. At What Exit Toastmasters, we understand you're busy. Your commute and/or work schedule probably prevents you for taking some time to get out, work on your development and network as you'd like so when you DO come to work on these skills we also want you to experience a friendly environment, with a good sense of humor.

Just a few reasons you should visit What Exit 
1. Convenient Centrally located weekend afternoon meetings - no worries about trying to find time during your lunch break or after work. We meet the 4th Saturday each month at 3 pm in Edison, NJ leaving you plenty of time for weekend plans/family and other commitments 
2. Increase your communication skills - not only speaking but listening! Strong communication skills help you both personally and professionally.
3. A chance to be part of a 91 year strong professional international organization with unlimited networking opportunities
4. Advance your communication and leadership skills at your own pace with real time feedback from mentors and fellow members 
5. Cost of a professional development seminar - thousands of dollars. Cost of a community college credit in NJ $100+. Monthly dues for What Exit - only $7 a month. 
6. Earn education credentials that you can put on your resume to advance your career
7. Because we have the best club name in NJ and you're just going to sound cool to say you're a member 
8. Get the opportunity to help start a brand new club and help contribute to its success! 
9. Optional social events after each meeting to help you meet people and make connections as well as have fun!
10. Overcome your fear of public speaking and learn to think on your feet with impromptu speaking 
11. Warm, welcome, encouraging and supportive environment! 
12. Prepare for your next work presentation, sales pitch, interview in a safe environment 
13. Pick up or enhance skills in marketing, time management, project management, delegation, budgeting, record keeping and more
14. You get to have FUN while you do all of the above!

What are you waiting for? Come to our next info meeting and bring a friend (or multiple friends!)
results.name: What Exit Toastmasters

results.description:
"Welcome to Aspiring Millionaire Meetup Club (AMMC)!

Aspiring Millionaire Meetup Club members include but not limited to startup entrepreneurs, talented  individual, financial professionals, small business owners, and who are looking to enjoy the many benefits being financial independence.

You are here because you know this is the bests time to start.  Aspiring Millionaire Meetup Club is the place to meet and build relationship with others looking to share ideas, opportunities, resources to help you achieve your financial goals. 

Membership is free.

Let's get together to enjoy all the great things this neighborhood has to offer. Meetups will include happy hours, local events, and most importantly dinner parties featuring my homemade pizza. Who knows, maybe we'll decide to venture outside the neighborhood for something (if it's worth it).

We are passionate about Sporting Clays and are looking for other clay dusters who want to expand the sport in the NYC area. Let's organize in-state events like traveling upstate to Mid-Hudson Sporting Clays or Orvis Sandanona... or let's get on the road every now and then and travel to national competitions. We can also raise awareness for the sport in the local area and help fuel its rising growth in the US.

results.description:
A God Chaser is a person whose passion for God's presence presses him to chase the impossible in hopes in the uncatchable might catch him. A child chases a loving parent until, suddenly, the strong arms of the father enfold the chaser. The pursuer becomes the captive; the pursued the captor. Paul put it this way: "I chase after that I may catch that which apprehended me: (Phil. 3:12) Add your name tothe list. . . become a God chaser. Who knows? You might one whom He catches.

Enjoy the company of other believers seeking the face of God! All are welcomed!
results.name: God Chasers

results.description: Wall Street Toastmasters brings together people from varied backgrounds with the desire of enhancing our public speaking skills in an encouraging environment.
results.name: Wall Street Toastmasters

results.description:
Ladies, Are you tired of the barrage of, “Hey baby, what’s up gorgeous” or corny pickup lines and love poem messages from men you wouldn’t date in the real world on OKCupid and Match? Sick of the unwanted cock photos on Tinder? Frustrated when men like your profile on OkCupid and you like theirs back, but when you’re a mutual match or you send a message you get nothing but radio silence? 


Fellas, Are you sick of sending a thousand messages a day to the hotties of your dreams but hearing nothing back? Are you sick of the women only looking for Ryan Gosling lookalikes and a fat wallet? 

If you’ve ever thought, “Why the fuck am I on this stupid website in the first place?” This is the group for you! This group is for everyone who is sick of the game that is online dating and wants to go back to meeting people the organic, normal way—you know, like, in real life. No more messaging or texting that goes nowhere. Just straight up face-to-face meetings right away and offline. Let’s be honest here folks. Statistically, you're not going to meet the love of your life/future wife or husband online and those who do are the exception—not the rule. This group will be like skipping the whole messaging part and going straight to coffee and a meet and greet. 


I started this group because, like you, I find myself single again in this daunting city and have resulted to online dating. Now I remember how much it sucks!!!! I know how hard it is to meet people in NYC and I know I’m not alone about how I feel. This group is also good for people new to the city that are interested in meeting great people. I have some FREE, fun, simple and creative ideas for this group, but I want to wait to see how many members it gets before starting meetups. So

 1. If you’re down with the cause, join this group 

2. If you’re interested in being a co organizer and getting in on this with me, message me

 3. If you have some fun dating ideas for this group you would like to share, message me 

4. If you’re single in NYC and, you know, don’t want to be single anymore, join this group! 


BYE!
results.name: Online Dating Sucks Singles Group NYC

results.description:
Are you searching for meaning in your life?
Have you ever felt happiness in your life...
...never lasts?

This Buddhist group has a great positive, multi-cultural atmosphere that helps people search for the answer to life's biggest questions.
Through the teachings of Buddha and historical Pure Land Buddhist teachers we understand better the direction our life needs to take in order to find the purpose of life.
We offer video lectures and have meetings to discuss how to obtain an absolute form of happiness.
I hope you'll stop by and attend a meeting when you have a chance!

Below, you'll find some more information about what Buddhism is all about as well as our contact info and location.
In Buddhism, we learn that there are two kinds of joy.

Relative Happiness

All the happiness we know is called Relative Happiness.
Money, status, fame, wealth, family, friends, and our loved ones are all included in this category.
Politics, economics, medicine, and the arts also try to provide us with Relative happiness.
We seek for this type of happiness day in, day out hoping we can attain true satisfaction from it.

Absolute Happiness

We are all seeking for a happiness which will truly last.
This kind of happiness is called Absolute Happiness.
The purpose of life is to attain it as quickly as possible while still alive.

Learn more at our meetups and check out some of our topics:
The Law of Cause and Effect
Six Good Deeds that Bring Happiness
Mirror of Truth
Dark Mind is the Root Cause of Suffering
results.name: New York Learn ABC of Buddhism and Purpose of Life Meetup

Now, can we create an environment where we could do business and do right by community and people by coming up with new solutions? As real estate professionals, we are at the frontline, now let's make a change!

results.description: This is a group designed for anyone interested in sales and sales psychology. If you are looking to meet other salespeople and gain knowledge on the best techniques in sales today, this group is for you. We will have regular meetings to exchange tips, techniques and selling strategy, and we will also have presentations about specific topics in sales. If you are serious about improving your sales game, feel free to answer one of the following questions on the message board, or send me a PM -What part of your sales strategy right now needs improvement? -what piece of information is stopping you from doubling your sales today? -what part of sales are you the most interested in and want to know more about? I started this group because I am truly passionate about sales and applied psychology and I am excited to share what I know with you, and learn more along the way.
results.name: New York Sales Strategy Meetup

results.description: Software and API Developers attend The New York FullContact Meetup for Developers to share ideas and sharpen the skills required to write high volume, efficient APIs and related software at scale. We host, sponsor, and support Meetups involving professionals who know that success in life is all about people. We support Meetups for professionals involved in startup businesses, software development, sales, marketing, customer service, and other people-focused technology roles.

DU gave us a great atmosphere to bond and I believe we can have truly stimulating conversations that would all help us excel as people, and hey something great may come of it. results.description:
The International Interior Design Association (IIDA) New York Chapter is a professional networking and educational association of 750+ Members in ten specialty Forums. IIDA NY provides our Members with the resources to reach expertise, knowledge and contacts. Networking and social events allow professionals and industry members to connect on more personal terms that encourage trust, collaboration, and innovation.

Our Chapter is proud to have been recognized as IIDA Large Chapter of the Year in 2011, 2008, 2001 and 2000.

The International Interior Design Association (IIDA) is the Commercial Interior Design Association with a global reach. We support design professionals, industry affiliates, educators, students, firms and their clients through our network of 15,000+ Members across 58 countries. We advocate for advancements in education, design excellence, legislation, leadership, accreditation, and community outreach to increase the value and understanding of Interior Design as a profession that enhances business value and positively impacts the health and well-being of people’s lives every day.

Visit us at http://www.iidany.org

Check out photos from our events: https://www.flickr.com/photos/iidany/
results.name: IIDA NY Chapter Meetup

This group is for parents and kids interested in hacking on computer programs, playing games, making animations, experimenting with big ideas and new technology, exchanging ideas and sharing information. Members must be over 18 years old and accompanied by a child to attend events.   Occasionally, there will be events for parents only.  Any children present at a Meetup must be supervised by a parent or guardian.  Volunteers are welcome!

results.description:
This group is for women looking to enhance their lives by learning to be as beautiful as possible (inside and out), as business minded as possible, and as bold (daring & adventurous) as possible.

We will learn how to maximize the quality of our lives and discover how to live it on our terms by taking advantage of all the resources available to us as! Activities will include investment/wealth building clubs, business seminars, weekend getaways, book clubs, makeup and photoshoot parties, cooking parties, website building, modeling and more!
results.name: Bold, Business Minded, Beauties!

results.description:
Ever find your self hunting ANSWERS in the business, psychology or self-help sections of bookstores, ONLINE or doing Yoga? What if you could upgrade your thoughts, feelings,habits and future like the apps on your tablet or smartphone? Are you stuck and can't get your life moving faster. What if there are NEW methods to RESET your life like when your smartphone freezes. "UPGRADE And RESET YOUR LIFE" provides tools that will make you happier, more passionate about life, more productive on your dreams, and wealthier. We will get you to "do life" and not just learn "about" it. You will make discoveries about yourself, stop negative thoughts, develop better habits, evolve beyond your wildest dreams. Each session you will practical cognitive tools to immediately take your life to the next level.
This is Not the lecture format you have seen and done many times in the past, there are better ways to learn and gain rapid results.

                                                  Forming A Community Of Shared "Specific Mind" Practices 

Our mission is to build a wide community of friends, family, and coworkers using New-art and other tools together during meetup sessions and in their daily lives.
What makes this different from anything else in the world, is each member will work on their "Specific Mind." For the first time ever people interested in self-improvement will work on their "Specific Mind" instead of an abstract philosophy of how people should work.
There are tools that can effect both emotions and habits. Like brain mapping you will learn to capture your specific unique mind, take measurements of habits, thoughts and emotions. Place the palm of your hand on your forehead. You are now centimeters form your frontal and prefrontal cortex. This is only one brain system out of the many that produce your unique personality and habits profile. We will take abstract concepts and transform them through the knowledge of neural science and physics into powerful physical tools you can touch. Self directed improvement could be so much more than short-lived inspiration.


                                                        Each SESSION Will Use New Art

A combination of cognitive, Neuro science and visual Art designed to unlock the architecture of your mind hidden within the vast landscape of your brain. New Art will allow each person to understand their own "Specific-Mind" like a MRI for the mind. The primary emphasis of New Art is developing self-awareness and choices. It becomes easy to literally see your limitations and problems while also seeing powerful solutions no other tools can provide. You will enhance the best of yourself while upgrading your life in ways beyond your dreams. Join this group to start UPGRADING YOUR LIFE each week. You will have fun while making real changes in your life. 

Each Session members will hold in their hands printed sheets of Art work they will use to record parts of their minds, solve problems, communicate with their minds (different from meditation), record measurements of mental activity. With the Art Work members of the community will be able to show each others what they are working on each week. Personal improvement moves form a philosophical talk to show me your Art work and what you are working on. Members will select projects and goals they will work on as individuals and within the community making possible everything form habit change, weight release, less stress, greater mental focus, solving business problems, removing fears and anxieties, becoming free from shyness, emotional clarity and more.  


GAIN CLARITY ABOUT WHAT YOU REALLY WANT IN YOUR BUSINESS AND PERSONAL LIFE

MAKE REAL CHANGES TO YOUR THOUGHTS, FEELINGS AND ACTIONS

DISCOVER THE HIDDEN ASSETS NEEDED TO BUILD YOUR FUTURE

TRANSFORM YOUR PAST INTO AN INVALUABLE SOURCE OF NEW POSSIBILITIES

USE YOUR EMOTIONS AS RESOURCES

YOU WILL DISCOVER HOW TO SET AND ACHIEVE GOALS IN THE REAL WORLD

DRAMATICALLY ENHANCE YOUR COMMUNICATION SKILLS

EACH SESSION WILL BE WILL BUILD ON THE LAST AND TAKE TO THE NEXT STEP
results.name: UPGRADE AND RESET YOUR LIFE

topics.name: Vegetarians and Vegans & Vegan Vegetarian Activism

results.description:
This Meetup provides a venue and scope to experience mantra chanting, learn and practice meditation, and other yogic practices of Ananda Marga. It is open to everyone interested in self-development and meditation.
Come and enjoy blissful kiirtana and meditation at Ananda Marga Yoga and Meditation Centre, located at 149 02 Melbourne Avenue, Flushing, NY 11367-1356. Ananda Marga Kiirtana is a practice combining the singing of the mantra BABA NAM KEVALAM and dancing the ancient Lalita Marmika dance. This prepares the mind for going deep into meditation. Most events are followed by a collective meal. Experienced yoga and meditation teachers of Ananda Marga participate and guide those interested in learning meditation and answer questions on spiritual topics.
results.name: Flushing Ananda Marga Meditation Meetup

results.description:
"Writers write while dreamers procrastinate."  (Best Kosova)

This meet-up was formed to help its member stay on the wagon and make blogging way of life.

We meet once a month, and spend the time in our meetings to discuss writing in general and blogging in particular:  writing style, tone, authority, grammar etc. We will also dedicate a lion share of our meetings' time to read and review each others posts and provide constructive feedback. Tips, learning, ideas and suggestions to keep blogging going are always welcome.

While this group focus mainly on the writing side of blogging, occasionally we'll talk also about other aspects of it, such as tools, and audience development.

Please read before applying:

This group is meant to remain small (less than 50 members). Our meetings are small and intimate. Therefore participation in our meetings and commitment to the group are essential. If you're planning to join just so you can feel part of such community, but are unwilling to commit, please don't apply. 

<br>
results.name: Blog writing

We meet weekly for fellowship, worship, instruction, community outreach, and evangelism, seeking opportunities to express the love of God. results.description:
"FRIENDS HELPING FRIENDS MAKE BUSINESS CONNECTIONS" - J.Z.

Calling all Entrepreneurs, Business Owners and those who dream of running their own venture!


If you desire to expand your business network, make more friends, find new customers and become a leader in your community, we have a fun and informal social networking group that is just right for you.


We'll have monthly meetings at coffee shops or neighbourhood bars in and around town to connect with others & learn "best practice" sales, marketing, finance and time management tactics and strategies from your city’s top entrepreneurs.


The Smart Success Business Network is a community run by volunteers with 101 Meetup groups in 101 cities across Australia, Canada, New Zealand, the United Kingdom and United States. 


MOST EVENTS ARE FREE AND ALL BUSINESS OWNERS & MANAGERS ARE WELCOME


• No attendance commitment required.
• You can arrive and leave on your schedule.
• No elevator pitches in front of the group required.
• Informal bar/restaurant meetings in the evenings.
• Most meetups are between Tuesdays & Thursdays.
• No long sit down meals next to strangers. 

Our mission is to encourage business success by recruiting small business owners to give group talks to their peers, potential customers and suppliers and new entrepreneurs to share their expertise and offer words of support and encouragement to their community. 


 We are also known as a "Pay it Forward" group. You might find your ideal client/customer here in your first meetup but it's more likely you will meet someone who can benefit from goods & services offered by your friends.

By networking to help other business owners and recommending products or services by other members, the benefits of increased sales accumulate to everyone in the group.
results.name: Smart Success Business Network of New York

We will try new amazing food and beverage experiences, see theater and concerts together, as one incredible group of dynamic craftspeeps and rioteers. Please note that admission to full Nightcap Riot productions must be purchased in advance at Nightcapriot.com and are subject to availability.

results.description:
Welcome to exchange the biz New York, where business networking begins. You can mingle with like minded individuals and create strong business relationships and even long lasting friendships. 

Whether you're a Sales Professional,  doctor, small business owner, designer, attorney or a DJ, Come join our bi-weekly meetings That we promise to be fun, full of energy & productive! 

You will meet like minded ambitious professionals from various fields and industries looking to share opportunities, resources, referrals, and leads to help you achieve your goals. 

Our focus is on our members efficiently utilizing and leveraging their ability to give out referrals by exchanging business for business at our networking events. '

We provides a positive, supportive, and structured environment for the development and exchange of quality business referrals. We do so by helping you build personal relationships with other qualified business professionals dedicated to networking and collaborating with each other, promoting one another's businesses and sharing resources for successful business growth and development. 

NETWORKING MATTERS, so don't delay, JOIN US TODAY!!!

results.description: this is a support circle for stay at home moms. the best thing we can do is not isolate ourselves or only talk to our kids during the week. listen, moms who work have just as many problems but a stay at home is a back breaking job because its 7 days a week. in my opinion its literally the hardest job ive ever faced but i am happy to have the PRIVLEDGE to b able to raise my kids and i remind myself of this whenever i c my friends going to their jobs outside the home. lol so lets talk and potentially do stuff if we want to but lets get some rest too. cause we r NOT unionized. lol cheers, u need to be over 28, at peace with being a stay at home mom, and have adequate child care help to get together. lets rest talk see how many of our issues are exactly the same and then lets get creative and take a walk in the park, cook healthy food, go antiquing, talk about the hottest president, whatever lol im new to montclair and my moms are always the glue that add strength love and positivity to my world. cheers<br>piper<br>i have s two year old and four year old. both girls</p>
results.name: Connecting With Other Stay At Home Moms

results.description:
WorldChoiceModels is where models take charge and host events for photographers in a variety of themes and locations: Bridal shoots, engagement shoots, portraits, fashion, action, sport, lifestyle, commercial branding, etc. Photographers can also request for themed events. Events are limited to 4 photographers. Most models seem to prefer 3 photographers. Those events with more than 4 are called paparazzi shoot-outs, they typically cost less. Some events are meet and greets or promotional events.

The models chosen to be on the team have been interviewed and have passed a series of criteria to participate. These models are professional and work well beyond the time behind the camera: They scout locations, contact venues, determine if permits are required or not and obtain them if feasible. Some events require they rent wardrobe or equipment and it doesn't need to be explained that there is a great deal of time doing all of that. This group nor the models do any TFPs... Ever. What's nice is the photographers never have to spend any time editing, copying or distributing pictures to models. That's right. Photographers are not obligated to share their pictures nor are the models expecting any from them. WorldChoiceModels is ideal for:

• Photographers that want to do street photography or photowalks with a model. • Photographers looking to practice their skills, experiment with their equipment or technique.

• Photographers looking to expand their portfolios. bridal, senior portraits, couples, fashion, commercial lifestyle, editorial, etc. From time to time there will be workshops on studio lighting, and specific genres. So keep a look out. Hopefully changing the name will attract women photographers ,which I know are many.

This is an excellent forum to practice and build your portfolio. In the next few months you will notice some admin activity and shortly after the models will take charge,

My best to everyone

John Bodensiek
results.name: !! "Brooklyn - New York - Model Events for Photographers"

We celebrate this space with tribal rhythms as we honor Fall release and prepare for Winter stillness, recognizing the interrelatedness of all things. results.description: I am an Empath, seeking to support other Empaths. Have been highly sensitive my whole life, sensing - seeing - hearing - knowing - things about others and my surroundings I had no way of knowing. For most of my life I absorbed other people's emotions and energies and could not distinguish them with my own. If people around me were angry, I would start feeling angry and didn't know why. If people around me were sad, I would feel sad and didn't know why. The same with joy - when people around me were joyful, I would feel full with joy. I would also absorb emotions of people I was close to, who lived at a distance. Or I would hear information about someone I knew, but discard it. By learning how to navigate this skill set and gifts -- and they are gifts once you learn to use them, and adding tools as well, separating what was me and where emotions came from became clear. Knowing my next right step became clear. Developing my Spirituality became paramount and added to the mix in a big blessing sort of way. I have been working with Empaths, as well as others, in my private Coaching Practice of 5 years. It's now time to start - EMPATH GROUP COACHING (in groups of 6 each) - by phone or skype. I'm kicking off my first group in January - there are some openings left. ----- If you'd like to join our Group in January (phone/skype) -- here are the details: https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/you-empath-corri-milner-cpc-mp-eli-2?trk=prof-post . Will be setting up Meetups in NYC every 1-2 Months, to help support there as well. Will look for a place to meet. Please let me know if such a Meetup would be something you would like to come to.
results.name: New York ~ Empath Support Meetup

We're all about building wealth in the urban Community. We will come together to explore different strategies and systems available to create wealth and work together to actually make it happen!  From evaluating different systems and strategies all the way up to starting and implementing various projects, this group will be an actual hands on experience in maximizing finances and building wealth.


Business lawyers, tax professionals and accountants strongly encouraged to join. African Americans have an extremely powerful purchasing power and I would like to see us leverage this in ways that benefit our families and communities.  


EQUAL EFFORT, EQUAL INVESTMENT, EQUAL REWARD! LETS GET STARTED!

results.description: Bonjour! French learners, let's meet up at a café/bar for conversation sessions in French, in a relaxed atmosphere! The best way to improve your oral skills is to immerse yourself in the language, and I offer you to do that a few times a week, 1 hour each session ($10/session). I am French and a graduated French teacher. I have been teaching for several years, mostly adults, in diverse countries and learning environments, and I've always loved the cultural exchange between my students and I! I offer conversation sessions for different levels: beginner (A1-A2), intermediate (B1-B2), advanced (B2-C1). (I can also give private lessons, for those interested please contact me via private message.) A bientôt!

results.description: Testing the waters with this group to gauge if there'd be any real interest...If you're a male in your 20s or 30s who is closeted, questioning, just starting the coming out process, or who recently came out, things can feel quite overwhelming and challenging, even in NYC in 2015. If you'd like to connect with others who are at a similar place in life in a safe, non-judgmental, supportive place, a meetup to offer some peer guidance and friendship could be valuable.
results.name: Coming Out In Your 20s/30s

results.description: ##ghghhhhhjjjkkķjjjjjjkkkkkkkkkkkkkk gggghhhgg gdrrrrf
results.name: BIMMER LIFE

results.description: Hi! My name is Stacy. I grew up in a small town in New Jersey where everyone knew everybody. I dated and married one of my best friends cousins. We had a demolition business together, got married, had a kid. We were together for 15 years. Life presented us with many challenges and ultimately our marriage ended. I went down a spiritual path studying everything from transcendental meditation to Kabbalah. Which led me to move closer to the city. After getting divorced and uprooting my entire life, which included changing careers I found myself in search of like minded people. Thus this Meetup... I'm looking to create something to help those who are in a similar situation and to bring us all together and enjoy our new endeavors in life. I'd like to create social events with single parents and kids, adults only events, and just some good old fashion fun. If you're like me and you want to meet like minded people come try my Meetup and let me know what kinds of things you'll like to do. Xo Stacy P.S. My hot friend Esther who's also divorced but no kids is co-organizer of my new meetup.
results.name: Jersey City Hot Fun Single Parent Meetup

topics.name: EFT for Amplifying The Law of Attraction

results.description:
"We are what we think. All that we are arises with our thoughts. With our thoughts, we make our world."
-Buddah

We all know the term "Law of Attraction." But, what is it, really? How does it work? And, what practical place does it have in day-to-day life?

The purpose of this group is to answer these questions, as well as bring like-minded people together to form a network of support in living with clear intention. 

You'll learn about the Universal Laws and Abraham Hicks' processes and practices. This will help you shift your energetic vibration, align with your higher self and empower you to deliberately create a life you love.

Coming together as a group to do this type of work is incredibly powerful. This is truly our life's work, and committing to our lives in this way is not only transformational for us. It's transformational for those around us.

This group meets the first Thursday of every month at 8pm.

Facilitated By: Jayme Cooper, Certified Law of Attraction Life Coach.
results.name: Law of Attraction--Rockland/Bergen Meetup

results.description:
Chapter of Global Internet Startups Meetup group, Brooklyn Internet Startups (BRIS) was founded in December 2015 and it is one of the fastest growing startup communities in New York.

Our events empower entrepreneurs by connecting people and creating opportunities for companies to develop new businesses, meet customers, launch new products, promote their brands and expand their markets.

BRIS strives to help: Entrepreneurs, Students, Techies, Startups, Investors, Mentors and Advisors.

This group will: Host great events, get you involved, connect people and help you take action.

Join, Participate and Enjoy! ☺

Home to some of USA's hottest startups, Brooklyn is an emerging force in the world of innovation. The purpose of this group is to bring together members of the local and international community to support and foster the growth of a thriving startup hub. Let's see how we can collaborate now and in the future to create, sustain and enable new and greater startups.

We are glad to have you on board and look forward to meeting you at one of our frequent events.

Sincerely, Jeff Robinson & the BRISTeam

P.S. You can find all our Meetups here: Global Internet Startups. Check us out when you're traveling or if you ever move abroad!
results.name: Brooklyn Internet Startups

results.description: This group is all about making new friends, and meeting new people. Having a lot of friends is very important. In this group, we will all make new friends!!!
results.name: Make New Friends NYC Meetup Group

results.description: Are you new in town and need friends to talk to, to hang out with and share passions together? Or are you from here and looking to meet new awesome people? How about having a conversation session in a new language or play your favorite musical instrument to make a nice symphony? Any other suggestions? Let's make this group together to feel home in this dynamic multicultural charming city.
results.name: Home away from home, NYC

results.description: Our aim is to bring together a dynamic group of emerging reuse, recycling, and composting professionals to share updates, connect, and, most importantly, have fun! All are welcome - whether you have years of experience, are new to the industry, or a student eager to get involved.
results.name: NYS Association for Reduction, Reuse and Recycling

results.description: AIESEC Youth Action Summit is a three-day conference bringing together top young leaders with experts, government, business and thought leaders for a conversation around world issues and new global agenda. It is a call to action from youth globally to focus on the impact beyond 2015. At AIESEC Youth Action Summit, we will take a deeper look into the state of the world and the impact of the Millennium Development Goals, to be able to grasp the potential of the Sustainable Development Goals. We will define the role each stakeholder plays in it, especially young people and will generate actionable ideas to be implemented after the summit. The event will act as a platform, connecting different sectors to come together and co-create actions. AIESEC Youth Action Summit is a place where new and actionable ideas will be born to be implemented to impact the world and its future. Register here: http://aiesecyouthactionsummit.com/register/
results.name: SDG and Global Youth Summit Meetup

results.description: Taking after the 16th century tradition of Salons where people would meet and discuss topics in small groups, I thought we could do something similar for CS. The idea would be to meet once a month or so in a small group for a few hours on a weekend. Before each meeting, we need to pick a topic &| white paper to discuss, e.g. Hewitt Actor Model, and Akka design, or Paxos paper and Raft protocol. I can host the meetup at my place in Brooklyn where I have a room full of chalkboard walls. We'll start small and see if this works at all, I hope so! O, and bourbon/gin is allowed during the discussions. ;-)
results.name: CS Sala: Papers, Protocols, projects and Procrastination

results.description: Welcome to music. This is a music group with performances by live vocal groups, bands, solo artists and other music based art, in rare cases of DJs spinning on a turntable. The music can range from R and B, Pop, Rock and Roll, Hip-Hop, Jazz, Reggae, Calypso, Soca, Merengue, Afro-Cuban, Reggaeton and anything else in between. Some events are local in New York City and New Jersey with dinner while others are day trip events with buses commuting from the five boroughs to dinner halls then concerts halls. Some live artist who participate are well known and others are up and coming. Some are events with 70's, 80's or 90's themes while others presenting the current styles of music. Some are live shows with artist and other are dancing events. These are usually free or low cost events that are sponsored by The Making A Difference with Morinda Organization which focuses on charity, health and fitness. So some events may include a short sponsorship presentation or venue advertisement of maintaining and living in better health from a sponsor representative for 30 minutes prior to a show. Either way this is your ticket to fun and enjoyment with great people and great music.
results.name: New York / New Jersey Live Music Meetup Group

results.description: There will be various event types for this group. Some events will focus on intuitive healing for all areas of your life. Other events will help you transcend duality consciousness and rise to Om consciousness or Unity consciousness (Oneness). I hope you will join us and connect with like minded sweet souls!
results.name: Om Consciousness and Healing

topics.name: Small Groups - Book Club, Discuss Issues

results.description:
This Meetup is for those who love to read fiction novels and are looking for a book discussion group in NYC.

We’ll be meeting up about once a month to share our thoughts about a particular book. It’ll be very low-key and will often take place in venues that follow that book’s theme. Those in their 20s and 30s are preferred. 

We’ll primarily read fiction novels, but will also occasionally read short story collections, essays, and memoirs. There may also be opportunities to do a book and movie discussion, seeing that so many films these days are based on books. Please take a look at our upcoming Meetups! 

Thanks for your consideration, and see you soon! :)
results.name: Good Book Hunting

results.description: This is a group for anyone who wants likes to listen to Tara Brach's freely offered dharma talks. We meet weekly or bi-weekly to reflect on a chosen talk, and share our experiences working with the themes in our lives. It is a supportive and easy group, with the intension to create sangha and connect with like-minded folks. Come join us! (Near Q train to Prospect Park)
results.name: Tara Brach Discussion Group/ Sharing Circle

topics.name: We're a Red Hat Society Chapter

results.description:
We are an established Red Hat Society chapter for many years. We are currenly recruiting new members age 50+ for monthly luncheons as well as weekly dinner parties with entertainment at various restaurants in Brooklyn. We also attend shows and go to Resorts World Casino.
Most of our activities are in the Southern end of Brooklyn from Canarsie, Mill Basin, Sheepshead Bay, Diker Beach, Bay Ridge and Park Slope.
results.name: SPARKLING JEWELS 2 (RED HAT SOCIETY CHAPTER)

results.description: A meetup for folks interested in Bitcoin based in Brooklyn. Novices, experts, and everyone in between welcome!
results.name: BTCBrooklyn

results.description: I strongly encourage those interested in magic, astrology/tarot reading to join this meet up.We will be learning about small rituals, past life karma and astrology/tarot/meditation.
results.name: Enchanted Witches Group

results.description: If you're on meetup.com, chances are you know the importance of networking to generate new business. Networking leads to business referrals which are THE fastest way to grow your business. Over 98% of businesses get business from referrals, yet only 3% of those businesses have a plan to consistently get those referrals. Are you ready to join the 3%? For 30 years BNI has used a simple but elegant philosophy that exemplifies membership, "Givers Gain." By helping other members grow their business those same members will in turn help you grow your business. In 2014 BNI members passed 6.6 million referrals that generated an amazing $8.6 billion worth of closed business. Whether you're new to BNI or have some experience, chances are you've never seen anything like Revenue Raisers before. We're 20+ (and counting) highly motivated, enthusiastic and generous professionals that genuinely care about each other and growing each others business from consistent warm referrals. Our members span from fields as diverse as real estate, legal, tech, marketing, finance, and health and wellness. We have power teams that can take you and your business to that next level. Best of all, we only allow one person per profession. If your profession isn't yet represented in our chapter, you could quickly become the go-to guy or gal. Imagine what having 20+ hungry salespeople looking for new business for you around the clock could do for your business. Are you our next success story? RSVP to our next meeting (Tuesdays at 7:00AM at Junior's) and see for yourself how BNI can change your business and your life for the better. Because, who couldn't use a smoking hot referral RIGHT NOW?! Current Location: Junior's 386 Flatbush Ave Ext Brooklyn, NY 11201 Cost: $20/visitor The meeting starts at 7:00am and is officially over at 8:30am. You will need to bring 50+ business cards to pass to everyone in the room. You will also need to be prepared to tell the room who you are, what you do, and who a perfect referral for you would be. The more specific you are in asking for the referral the greater chance you have in receiving that life changing referral on the spot.
results.name: BNI Revenue Raisers, Brooklyn NY

results.description: This group is inspired by the growing number of individuals who have been provided with government grants to assist with their transition into stable housing. Programs like LINC, City FEPS, and Section 8. I would like to invite Landlords and individuals who are considering becoming landlords to join our group to list your vacancies, meet prospective tenants and network with other professionals in the NYC Real Estate market.
results.name: Heavenly Tenant
